annotations.description: In this episode of How to Drink, I’m making a classic cocktail, the Whiskey Smash. This one goes back to the birth of modern cocktails in the 1860’s when Jer...
annotations.title: Whiskey Smash | How to Drink

textContent:
2oz Rye
8-12 Mint leaves
.25oz Gomme syrup/Simple syrup

Shake and pour
Garnish with fruit slice (blood orange) and mint

title: Whiskey Smash
